lines.text: How would you like your steaks cooked?
Oh, just knock its horns off, wipe its nasty ass, and chunk it right here on this plate.
It's your call, stubby.
If it's got hair, I can ride it. If it's got a beat, I can dance to it.
Look, Mom!... Cowboys!
And would you care to order wine with your meal?
Uh, yah why don't you bring us a bottle of something or other, uh not too sweet, American.
American something or other, yes sir an excellent choice and would you like glasses or do you prefer to drink directly from the bottle?
Well, um, glasses I reckon and oh hay toss a litle ice in mine if you would my good man.
Ice, certainly sir. Nothing could surprise me now.
So, what did you do to make the money to buy this? You didn't give that old lady a fake check did you?
No, of course not.
[under his breath]
Bitch wouldn't take a check.

[Pepper drags Sonny behind a Horse Carriage hiding from the Owners of the Waldorf Astoria]
Pepper, those People are guessing that You skipped the Bill.
Oh yeah, well they guessed right!
Well, then pay them!
Yeah right, with what?
You lying Son of a Bitch, You told Me You still got some of that Prize Money left!
Of course I do, have I ever lied to You before?
Well, how much do You got?
About 8 Bucks, I reckon.
About 8 Bucks, I reckon?
Better than a poke in the Eye.

[Starts walking off]
Pepper, I've about had it with You!
Well what do you know, our friend here isn't wearing any underpants!
What's a baby cow gonna do to me?
[Sonny shrugs and pulls down Chango's pants]
Hey come on man!, what you doing?
I am embarrassed, our friend here isn't wearing any underpants.

[pulls a baby calf out of the barn and the calf starts snorting]
He sees it!
Damn, that hungry devil thinks your little wee-wee is his mama's teat.
Hey hey man, you guys can't do this.
I'll ask you one more time asshole, where's Teresa?
I ain't telling you shit!
It's your call stubby, let him go Pepper!.
[Pepper releases the calf and it makes its way towards Chango]
whoa!
[begins to moan as the calf begins to suck his penis]
Damn, that looks like it hurts.
Where you guys from, Texas?
Texas? Ain't no real cowboys from Texas, we're from New Mexico.
How would you gentlemen like your steak prepared?
Prepared? Oh you mean cooked?
Yes, of course, that's what I should have said, cooked.
